mapper.insert: insert into medicine (medicine_id, medicine_usage, medicine_name, medicine_specifications, medicine_unit, medicine_factory, medicine_formulation, medicine_type, medicine_unit_price, medicine_pinyin) values(#{medicine_id}, #{medicine_usage}, #{medicine_name}, #{medicine_specifications}, #{medicine_unit}, #{medicine_factory}, #{medicine_formulation}, #{medicine_type}, #{medicine_unit_price}, #{medicine_pinyin})
mapper.update: update medicine set medicine_usage = #{medicine_usage}, medicine_name = #{medicine_name}, medicine_specifications = #{medicine_specifications}, medicine_unit = #{medicine_unit}, medicine_factory = #{medicine_factory}, medicine_formulation = #{medicine_formulation}, medicine_type = #{medicine_type}, medicine_unit_price = #{medicine_unit_price}, medicine_pinyin = #{medicine_pinyin} where medicine_id = #{medicine_id}
mapper.select: select * from medicine where medicine_id LIKE concat(concat('%',#{medicine_id}),'%')
